wo-135-3-refactor.instruction: Refactor Household and Firm agents to use ConfigFactory and DecisionContext as per design/work_orders/reboot_plan_remainder.md. Mandatory: 1) Remove 'import config' from agents, 2) Use ConfigDTOs in __init__, 3) Refactor decision methods to use DecisionContext, 4) Verify against Golden Samples. Strictly follow Data-Driven Purity.
wo-135-3-refactor.title: WO-135.3: Core Agent/Engine Refactor
